wmndsLiveDeparturesTrainProps.name: showFiltered
wmndsLiveDeparturesTrainProps.description: Determines whether to show in filtered mode

wmndsLiveDeparturesTrainProps.description: The time that the departures were last updated e.g. 9:30am

wmndsLiveDeparturesTrainProps.description: Array of objects containing the departures information
